title: Test with System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler.Send fails
description: Test failing with The synchronous method is not supported by 'System.Net.Http.BrowserHttpHandler'. If you're using a custom 'HttpMessageHandler' and wish to use synchronous HTTP methods, you must override its 'Send' virtual method.

title: Opening Stream Writer on file named CON.* exception could be informative.
description:
Opening Stream Writer on file named CON.* exception could be informative.
Be as descriptive as you can with your title.
Using .net 5.0.0-rc.1.20452.2
Opening file with StreamWriter named CON.cs causes a 'not supported exception.'
The code involved:

title: dotnet-dump collect never returns
description: I'm trying to collect a dump file on a dotnet core 3.1 process running in docker container FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/runtime:3.1-bionic and the collect call just never returns. It sits there with the message, "Writing full to /root/core_20201001_202020" What can I do to diagnose this? I see there is a --diag flag, what will this do? Write a debug file, where?

title: Enumeration value emitted as empty object
description: When serializing enums, if the field type is Enum then the emitted value is {}
